tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE access_control_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    entry_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    exit_time TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    access_granted BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS security_guards (
    guard_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR,
    last_name VARCHAR,
    shift_start TIME,
    shift_end TIME
);
